name: Roll20 Light Inversion
description: A basic dark mode for Roll20 games that mostly just inverts the lightness of the standard colors with a few more specific tweaks here and there. This only has effect in-game or on chat-archives.
additional_info:
Technically, the lightness inversions are usually accomplished by a 180 degree hue rotation followed by a 100% invert. This results in an issue where color pickers may not display the selected color correctly. Highly saturated colors seem to lose saturation in the process. Images could also lose some saturation.

"Pages" (maps or whatever is in the editor panel) are not affected. Use the page settings to choose custom colors for your own dark mode on those.
